name: Christ.sys
description:
Christ.Sys is an introspective animation piece of work with noise aesthetics which represented the beginings of a personal lenguage development cycle.

This piece is a post15M/2011 which gave me the chance to express the rejection pulsions mostly happened in the 15M/2011 occuppy movement.

Everything is channelled by depicting authoritarian religious iconography using a 3d lo-fi in a queer paranoid aesthetics.

Festival screenings:

2014: Pantalla Lliure, L'alternativa, CCCB. Barcelona.
2013: BYOB Mutuo Centro de Arte. Barcelona
2013: Ghosting.tv, Los Angeles (USA)

Year of production: 2011
Video/h264
640x480px
Duration: 1:54"
